sentences.en: Flyer : A surprise attack , usually by a solo rider.
sentences.cn: 飞超: 一般为单人突然的冲刺.

sentences.en: Flyer frame is one of the important equipment in cotton spinning mill.
sentences.cn: 粗纱机是棉纺厂的重要生产设备.

sentences.en: Gathering frequent flyer miles is one of the perks of OCS travel.
sentences.cn: 积累飞行里程是商务旅行的额外补贴之一.

sentences.en: He was proficient both as a flyer and as a navigator.
sentences.cn: 他既精于飞行,又善于导航.

sentences.en: In May of that year, Wilbur sailed to France to demonstrate their new Type A Flyer.
sentences.cn: 那年5月, 威尔伯乘船到法国展示他们新型的“A型飞行器”.

sentences.en: Mail - coach races against mail - coach , and high - flyer against high - flyer , through the most remote districts of Britain.
sentences.cn: 甚至在不列颠最偏僻的地区,邮车与邮车, 轻便马车与轻便马车都在互相竞赛.

sentences.en: One could dismiss the paper as a campaign flyer unworthy of analysis.
sentences.cn: 人们可能认为这份报告是政治传单,不值得分析.

sentences.en: People were giving out flyers advertising the event.
sentences.cn: 人们在分发这次活动的广告传单。

sentences.en: Please see the flyer enclosed with this issue for details.
sentences.cn: 具体请看和这份出版物装在一起的传单.

sentences.en: Take a look at this thread started by Flyer.
sentences.cn: 在这一线程看看开始的传单.

sentences.en: The iconic red Flyer wagons for children are now made in China.
sentences.cn: 连小孩子玩的经典红色玩具车现在在中国制造.
他们把这架飞机命名为“飞行器1号”.

sentences.en: They were part of the black box associated with high-flyer management development.
sentences.cn: 它们是与储备主管培训相关的神秘体系的一部分。

sentences.en: Things got a little rough , and Manty decided to take a flyer.
sentences.cn: 情况变得有些复杂了,马蒂决定立即逃走.

sentences.en: This I, naturally, had to read from program flyer.
sentences.cn: 关于这位作曲家, 当然, 我不得不看节目单.

sentences.en: This is the Blue - throated, a beautiful bird and magnificent flyer.
sentences.cn: 照片上这种是蓝喉的, 华美的一种鸟.
